entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
